Text:
This is a GREAT release from PUKKA. First, the quality is awesome on this. Picture looks great with a resolution of 672×352. Audio is also fantastic at AC3 5.1. There is a "Property of..." statement that runs across the bottom of the screen approximately 3-4 times the whole movie. This is a great release for a great movie.

For screenshots and nfo: http://www.hypoh.com/movies/dvdscr/childrenofmendvdscreenerxvid-pukka
When a DVDScreener is out, a DVDRip is usually right around the corner.

A film greatly anticipated, but quite a disappointment - a very bleak and weak look into the not-too-distant future. Some terrific scenery and what could-have-been an interesting story, but despite Clive Owen the movie soon turns into a death struggle. It goes nowhere. Afterwards it's like "Oh, so it ended there...well, what happened?". A lot of good ideas wasted in the end, too heavy on the symbolism and with a lot of reference to, f.i, The Bible & Jesus, V for Vendetta, 1984, The Survivors (TV-show mid-70ies) plus a lot else, blended into a tasteless mix. But hey, that's just kinda my opinion.
